summary: Provides a configuration class that encapsulates the settings required to invoke Fireworks AI's chat completion endpoint, offering utilities to retrieve authentication secrets, enumerate supported OpenAI‑style parameters, and translate OpenAI request fields into the native Fireworks AI format.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Fireworks AI chat models into the Litellm ecosystem by handling credential management and parameter conversion, enabling users to interact with Fireworks AI using familiar OpenAI‑compatible calls.
